description: Create user wallets from your mobile app in under 5 minutes
note: This quickstart uses Expo for easier setup.
howItWorks: This quickstart uses `@crossmint/client-sdk-react-native-ui` to integrate Crossmint wallets into a React Native app. The `CrossmintProvider` component wraps your app and manages API authentication. `CrossmintAuthProvider` handles headless user login via email OTP, while `CrossmintWalletProvider` automatically creates a wallet when users sign in. The `useCrossmintAuth` and `useWallet` hooks provide access to authentication state and wallet operations.

snippets.title: Configure the Providers
snippets.description: Wrap your app with Crossmint providers to enable authentication and wallet creation.
snippets.accordion: The `CrossmintProvider` initializes the SDK with your API key. `CrossmintAuthProvider` manages user sessions with headless authentication. `CrossmintWalletProvider` with `createOnLogin` automatically creates a wallet on Base Sepolia when users authenticate.

snippets.title: Add Authentication
snippets.description: The `useCrossmintAuth` hook provides headless email OTP authentication for React Native.
snippets.accordion: Crossmint Auth in React Native is headless, so you implement your own login UI. Call `crossmintAuth.sendEmailOtp()` to send a verification code, then `crossmintAuth.confirmEmailOtp()` to verify it. Pass the resulting secret to `createAuthSession()` to complete login.

snippets.title: Display Wallet Info
snippets.description: The `useWallet` hook returns the connected `wallet` and its creation `status`.

snippets.title: Check and Fund Balance
snippets.description: Use `wallet.balances()` to fetch token balances and `wallet.stagingFund()` to add testnet tokens.

snippets.title: Transfer Tokens
snippets.description: Use `wallet.send()` to transfer tokens to another address.
